website_summaries.verdict: A solid and comfortable fit for those looking for a good winter boot.
pros: Warm and dry are two terms that best sum up this boot
The insulation keeps the boot warm without it being too bulky
The waterproofing is great for wading through the snow
cons: The design of the upper lacings has turned off some buyers
Traction is also not great on ice or wet wood

customer_reviews.title: nice boot!
customer_reviews.text: These have been super solid boots so far. Comfortable enough to wear around at your destination, not just for the treks through the snow. While warm, I haven't felt so far like my feet are overheating. I wouldn't wear them as a daily shoe, but in Chicago we have some rough days these are perfect for. Seem so far to be well made and don't look overly "technical." I bought a half size up to accommodate for socks, a little roomy, but well within the norm of what's to be expected. I used to have a pair of Vasque hiking boots many years ago that were a little tight, but these seem truer to size.
customer_reviews.author: amarevcp

customer_reviews.title: Great boots at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots at a great price - when I saw the price and a disclaimer indicating some wear shows on the boots, I was a little hesitant but ordered anyway. I'm glad I did, the boots fit perfectly and there were no signs of wear or abuse - this is one of the best buys I've made in some time. Since I already own Vasque brand summer hiking boots I was confident of the quality and these Snowburban boots are of good quality. I will be using these in the Austrain Alps this winter:-)
customer_reviews.author: Sig

customer_reviews.title: Another great boot from Vasque
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Vasque boots, they fit me exactly the way the other two pair fit. I took a very long walk around some fields early one morning when the grass which was taller than the boots was still soaked with dew and my socks were 100% dry. The boots were very comfortable and I can't wait to try these with my snowshoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent winter hiker
customer_reviews.text: Overall great boot. I found it very comfortable and effective during a couple of half day cold weather outings, one of which included o snow shoeing in zero degree temps. My feet felt slightly cold after several hours (wearing wool socks and liners). I generally suffer form extreme cold sensitivity in my toes and fingers, but found the apparent drop off in insulation somewhat surprising - hence only four stars. Several reviewers have criticized the lacing system, however, in my opinion the lacing system is brilliant and much easier to use than the typical speed lacing system. Traction is great through mud and snow, and the boot provides great stability and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: The Best Winter/Snow Boot for the Price By Far!
customer_reviews.text: These winter/snow boots are wonderful for several specific reasons: 1. BUILD - is exceptional with premium materials and immaculate stitching. 2. SOLES - are first class and perform exceptionally well in snow and slippery conditions. 3. WEATHERPROOF - they offer complete protection from water, ice, snow and cold. 4. COMFORTABLE - cushy and warm with a snug fit. They did not need to be worn in! 5. COST - these are the best value of any of the 30-40 pairs I considered before deciding on these. The only slight negative is that they take some patience and elbow grease to get on and off...a small price to pay for all the wonderful aspects of this awesome boot.
customer_reviews.author: DJPeebs

customer_reviews.title: How can you screw up laces?
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Vasque boots for over 10 years, and this is the first time I've regretted ordering a pair without trying them on. The lacing system is horrible. You have to completely unlace the upper portion to get out of them, without having to wrench them off. Otherwise warm and seem durable. I ordered them right before a long trip, so I had to use them. Otherwise I would have returned them. Still love wearing the Breeze the rest of the year though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Femia

customer_reviews.title: keep my feet warm while operating my snow blower on the tractor and provide excellent and dry traction when shoveling by hand
customer_reviews.text: Received these just before the record-setting Maryland blizzard. They fit well, keep my feet warm while operating my snow blower on the tractor and provide excellent and dry traction when shoveling by hand. The lining works best for me with a light pair of socks; heavy socks tend to bunch. They're a fine pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: baker2

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm, dry, and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for occasional trips to the snow. They are very comfortable for a full size boot. Light weight, warm and waterproof. I've taken short hikes along the river in knee deep fresh powder and these boots(in combination with good pants kept my feet warm and dry. They are not great on ice(you will slip all over the place without crampons. I am not working daily in these boots, so I can't speak to their long term durability. Other reviewers mentioned the lacing system was difficult and prone to failure but I had no trouble. For my occasional use, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Winter motorcycle riding and they're the warmest boots I've had so far. I've purchased Vasque boots before and loved them, this "model" is no different. They are SUPER comfortable and I don't have any sore spots even though they're brand new. I've been wearing them for a solid week and they're just great boots. The back of my foot kind of popped "out" when walking but that's to be expected with a lot of boots (especially cowboy boots) when they're brand new. After a week it has just about stopped happening. I have never bought a pair of Vasque boots that I didn't absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: These are really good boots. I use them for snowshoeing and cold ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really good boots. I use them for snowshoeing and cold weather activities. The weather has been too warm to recommend use below 0 F, however I have been warm in the 10-15 F while walking or snowshoeing. I usually wear a wool socks. Not a good boot for me for ice fishing but for active use I am happy for my purchase. My normal shoe size is a 9 or 9 1/2, but I bought a a size 10 to allow for thick socks. Very happy with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: P. Geisler

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these specifically for FatBike riding and they have been amazing. The boot is fairly stiff providing great contact with the pedals. They are extremely warm and I've not yet had my feet get even a little bit damp! These may be the best cold-weather boots I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great winter hiking boot.
customer_reviews.text: My feet have always stayed warm and dry while hiking with these in winter. The hook in front is perfect for gaiters, I pair them with OR Crocodiles Gaiters and can post hole through deep snow all day. I found these boots perfect for hiking Mount Washington in winter when most other hikers were wearing plastic mountaineering boots at 2-3x the cost.
customer_reviews.author: uncle_leo

customer_reviews.title: A great midrange  boot.  Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot. I have worn them several times now in 25-35 F weather and my feet have been very warm with a single pair of icebreaker wool socks. I have also worn them for 6 to 8 hours at a time while taking 3 to 5 mile casual hikes. Very comfortable on my feet with no problems of rubbing at all. Traction on nearly all types of ground has been awesome. Traction is pretty good on bare rock. Tree roots though are slippery as ice. I would easily recommend these to anyone without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: RichardK

customer_reviews.title: so for that price wow (of course it was May) if you buy them off season the price might be better. They are so far the most comf
customer_reviews.text: I got them for around 50, so for that price wow (of course it was May) if you buy them off season the price might be better. They are so far the most comfortable winter boot I have ever tried. I usually wear a 12.5, I bought the 13, there is some extra room, but better that then too tight for me. The lacing is weird, but the comfort is high The uppers do not rub or bother my calfs at all, very nicely padded, and the build quality initially seems high
customer_reviews.author: Bright Day

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on., but comfortable, upgraded to 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof. Added a felt insole for warmth - that helped. As others noted,having lacing hooks above the four sets of eyelets would help. I do like the boot once it's on, but getting it on is a struggle. The tongue is sewed high up the boot to aid in waterproofing, but is done in a way that restricts entry of the foot into the boot. Perhaps accountants helped design this boot.
customer_reviews.author: dennisaitch

customer_reviews.title: Could be great for right application.
customer_reviews.text: These may very well be awesome hiking boots. Very warm and comfortable. I don't hike. I was looking for comfortable everyday winter boots to wear all day at my office as well as playing in the snow with the kids. For me they were a little tight getting my foot in and out. They are warm...very warm to the point I couldn't wear them indoors very long. Again for hiking these would be great but just not what I was looking for. I'm more of a "leave your boots loosely laced so you can just slide em on and off easily" kind of guy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! Any outdoorsman can use these or anyone who works outside.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of boots. My son works for UPS and has went through many boots over the years. He told me to buy these boots. He has been working 12-16 hours a day in lots of snow and below zero weather and told me he has NEVER got wet or cold with these boots. Great boots and very well made. Even bought a pair for my other son who also works in the elements!
customer_reviews.author: William A. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new boots!!! little heavy but this is what I need right now. UPDATE 2016: Very well constructed, little heavy for me but maybe that is the main idea for snow walk, since i do not have snow here I don't know. very warm and sometime too warm but is not boots problem so boots are excellent. I fix that not using the last hole for hte lace so get little more open and that helps when is not winter time. If were little light weight would pe 6 stars :-)
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo Assmus

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I have only done one 9 mile trek up Mt. Washington but I am pleased so far. Very warm although I have not done below zero temps yet. I do not understand the complaints on the laces, they seem to work very well for me. Almost as fast as hooks and easy to undo boots as it has a "flag" for loosening the laces. To prevent pulling laces through the top eyelet I tied a small knot on the very end on the lace and not a problem. Fit is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chickenman40

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully, I can bump this to 5 stars when ...
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully,I can bump this to 5 stars when we get some snow. P.S. Wore these on Mt Washington, NH, where temp was -30F with wind, climbed up through over 1.5 ft of fresh snow, and my feet stayed warm and dry. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Emmet

customer_reviews.title: Vasque answers the call
customer_reviews.text: my foot is between a 12 -13. I got the 13, with a heavy sock they were to tight. I almost kept them, there super tech made. the soles will be worn away before anything else. the lacing is not what I'm use too but once laced these are awesome ! I walked around for an hour deciding. If you want a comfortable, affordable, well made, jump an tromp in any of it kind a boots there here.
customer_reviews.author: JAMAS VONROCKMANN

customer_reviews.title: WOW these are really nice
customer_reviews.text: Size as stated. Lace up system is unique, but works well once you get the hang of it, which took about 2 minutes. They look very good on my feet. Can't wait for the snow to test them out. Every reason to think they will work out well. Note that they are the 400's. Saved $40 over REI offering of the exact same boot. Have been walking around in them all day and they feel great...no break-in requirement. Can't say enuf good about them. Great tread. Highly recommend these snow boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Zemans

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great Boots! I did a 7 mile snowshoe hike/climb out of the box. Very comfortable! I wear a size 11 and ordered an 11 1/2 to make sure I have room for heavy socks. They are true to size. My feet never got cold. It did appear the boots did absorb some water/moisture. I will spray on some water repellant before my next outing to make sure they ar waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: iHikeLV

customer_reviews.title: They are incredibly comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.text: I wore these all of last winter. They still look almost new, so they hold up well. They are incredibly comfortable to walk in. I live in North East WA, close to the Idaho panhandle, not too far on Canada so these were used in snow, ice, rain, and muck. I would definitely recommend these, but remember this is more lightweight boot. Not a hunting or ice fishing boot, lol.
customer_reviews.author: mojave45

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots!  Nice and toasty with great traction.
customer_reviews.text: Good boots! Nice and toasty so far. Fit could be better though. I normally wear a men's size 8.5 (US) -but they were too tight. The size 9 fits, but very difficult to gets boots off and forget about wearing a thicker pair of socks... not enough room. :(
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I have several pair of Vasque summer boots and LOVE THEM, so figured the winter style would be ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid hiker and never order boots online.... I always try them on before purchasing. I was in a pinch and needed a pair of winter boots a couple of weeks ago and decided to order these from Amazon. I have several pair of Vasque summer boots and LOVE THEM, so figured the winter style would be a similar fit. They fit well, they're warm and the same amazing quality as my summer pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Last boot i will ever need!
customer_reviews.text: First set is going on third winter still in great condition bought another set as backup, thinking about buying another because this boot performs so well I don't think I will ever need another. Search ended! They are light but toasty and breath well. Minnesota, enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great: They're comfortable, are relatively easy to put on and take off, and keep your feet warm and dry in the snow. I've done ten-mile hikes in the mountains in them in winter conditions, and they handled like champs.
customer_reviews.author: RealGood

customer_reviews.title: Great climbing boot
customer_reviews.text: I have used these boots a few times now and I must say they are the best boot I have had for climbing. Climbed a couple of NH 4000 footers thus weekend, both at night. The first night above tree line there was 73 mile per hour wind and a -50 windchill. I never felt the cold! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: i highly recommend these to anyone who is out in the cold ...
customer_reviews.text: this boot kept me warm and dry for 5 days out hunting. We were in sub zero temps hiking in snow up to mid-shin 12 to 18" deep. my feet were kept warm and dry the whole time. i highly recommend these to anyone who is out in the cold for long periods at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Ordered my usual size and it was too small, ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my usual size and it was too small, so ordered a size up and it was still too small. Went with a different boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love'm
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. Very comfortable. Have plowed through a lot of snow with them. My feet stay dry. No blisters. Rather stiff for support, but good on the feet. Hard enough to be protective and could handle a set of basic crampons. Light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great boot - but won't last forever
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these boots for 2 years - wore them every day during cold weather and most of each day at that. then just last month my feet are getting cold during just about every hike. so I deducted one star for boots wearing out too quickly inside.
customer_reviews.author: deerock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my trip to Iceland and they were awesome!! Very good traction, warmth and they were very comfortable. During my trip I hiked several miles in the snow and had no issues with them.There were also days where I just wore regular socks instead of thermal socks and they kept my feet warm and there were zero comfort issues
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have wore these boots a lot and they’ve held up well. Lightweight, waterproof is good, only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars wish they were a little warmer for 400 grams insulation. Good boot would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking
customer_reviews.text: This is my best boot ever and I have had many over the years being an older outdoors man. I like the grip and easy of putting them on. The lace system is very unique and easy to lace up and off once you get the system of working from the middle. It has a pull tab in the middle to make lacing up fast. They are not as warm as another pair I have, but seem to do the job in cold Colorado Mtn outtings.
customer_reviews.author: C Heim

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable and not clunky
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size, but I ordered a half-size larger to accommodate thick socks for super-cold weather. Instantly comfortable, even though I usually have trouble with high boots. I like the ankle support. I'm sure some Sorel models are warmer, but these do the trick without feeling like over-sized mukluks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chartier

customer_reviews.title: Das Boot
customer_reviews.text: Even though i'll eventually get used to the lacing, doesn't make the lacing any less ridiculous. Got the boots a size larger but still too tight. Won't purchase again unless they start making a ee width. I'll update this review on warmth & waterproofness shortly...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that the tongue is attached to the lace sides ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the tongue is attached to the lace sides of the boots on the inside so you have to unlace the top to get them on. I went past my return date without getting a good chance to try them out. They're a good solid warm boot, but just not like the last Vasque boot I bought.
customer_reviews.author: carp0331

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm - good grip for when snowshoes are off and walking in parking lots and so forth.
customer_reviews.author: CoMtWoman

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend these boots to others
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Surveyor and I brought these boots to keep my feet warm and dry. They have done the job thus far, but they run a little small. So I should have got a whole size larger and not a half, because I wear thicker sock in the winter. I would definitely recommend these boots to others.
customer_reviews.author: Montez H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Winter boots
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, warm and comfortable. Used it on a couple of long hikes already. Can't wait till Winter really kicks in to give these a test run in cold weather..
customer_reviews.author: Purrcy

customer_reviews.title: Fits a touch narrow - interesting lacing
customer_reviews.text: Couple of walks in the snow so far. Boots fit a tad narrow in the toe box and lacing scheme takes some getting used to so your heel doesn't slip, but overall great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, these boots are comfortable. Only have worn them for a short time to start breaking them in. Very warm. Cant really review at this time because of the short use.
customer_reviews.author: Gperdew

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these some time ago and the past couple of winter were relatively mild. This winter has been historic! All the cold and snow this was a great purchase. My feet dont remember what being cold and wet feel like. Before you spend on shoes, or sneakers make sure you get a pair of these!
customer_reviews.author: C H B

customer_reviews.title: hard to find a womens boot that is a sturdy boot that can hold up to a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: hard to find a womens boot that is a sturdy boot that can hold up to a lot of abuse... that is why i chose this mens boot. still looks nice on and super confortable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably pleased !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of boots I ordered in 3 days. I have to rave that these are yet the favorite boots that my bf has. He can't stop telling me how much he loves these boots. They are so comfortable and have kept his feet warm and dry. We live in Chicago, have had tons of snow and extreme cold temperatures. I can honestly say I am now a loyal customer of Amazon and will continue to order from them. Have had a wonderful experience with my orders. He truly loves his boots !!
customer_reviews.author: Mirna Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Although the insoles are OK, I replaced them with Montrail insoles which are the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bertelsen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic winter boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great winter hiking/snowshoe boots. Warm and comfortable. Yeah, the upper lacing system is weird. Whatever. My normal size was slightly large even with thick wool socks. A half size smaller was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pair of boots i have ever bought,I wore these boots snowshoeing and the temps were in the 20's and i was snowshoeing for 2 hr's and my feet did not get cold once,and they stayed dry,I would buy this boot again
customer_reviews.author: Rc Kiteflyer

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable, very warm boots. I have no problem at all with the lacing system--to take off the boots, all that's needed is to pull some slack in the upper sections of the laces. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet approved
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and warm I work in a freezer and these are great I have wide feet thought these would be to small when I received them but after a couple hours they stretched out and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great boot & affordable
customer_reviews.text: Just received these boots in time for a mild snow storm and so far I am very pleased. I agree with some comments about issues with the lacing, speed lacing hooks would be great. I did follow an earlier reviewers suggestion and by simply loosening the laces found that the boots go on and come off very easily! Also the better insulation lets me use lighter wools socks which are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom carey

customer_reviews.title: Great Vasque Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good boot. The sizing doesn't follow the Amazon sizing guide, so be careful. Vasque quality is evident throughout, I can't wait to get these out snowshoeing and winter cycling.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: these are the best winter boots I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Even though they're tight and hard to take on/off they're lighter than most boots. They kick up my feet while I'm walking which make me walk faster and they really are waterproof, I stuck my foot under slushy snow water to the point that my ankle was under water and my foot was still dry
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ordered these for husband. He really likes the fit and feel of them.Says that they are not to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: 2smc

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great, I'm using them in the snow in the city and water doesn't leak even when the streets are pretty messy, it keeps the warmth in, it sustains the ankle pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: judith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snow boot
customer_reviews.text: Great snow boots - unlike Sorel clodhoppers, these work while driving, and are generally comfortable and workable through a day.
customer_reviews.author: spence.munsinger

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots to hike to the top of Mount Kilimanjaro. The soles maintained a good grip on loose gravel, sand, mud, snow, ash, ice, boulders and on slopes of wet grass. The ankle supports performed well while allowing for full range of motion of my ankles. Well insulated for warmth.
customer_reviews.author: J. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet in the snow but they fit well. They were highly recommended to me from a few people. I initially never heard of vasque, but apparently they are on top of their game.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: they fit really well, for the most part they ...
customer_reviews.text: they fit really well, for the most part they kept my feet dry unless they get submerged and they kept my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: They keep my feet nice and warm I work out side for about 6 hours aday
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: My feet were never cold or wet. Comfortable after wearing all day in snow. Would recommend to all looking for a cold weather boot.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Good for snowshoeing
customer_reviews.text: These boots were alittle stiff to begine with but the more I use them the better they feel. I have a wide foot so I was concerned they would be to narrow but they are just right. Excellent purchase for the money
customer_reviews.author: James Jirschele

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very warm, very well made. They are, while not too small, very, very snug and a bit difficult to get off. They are comfortable while wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: These boots are very light and comfortable. I have nothing negatives to say about these ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very light and comfortable.I have nothing negatives to say about these boots they keep my feet warm
customer_reviews.author: M. Elie

customer_reviews.title: great,warm boot. beware lace eyelets!
customer_reviews.text: great boot, only fault is the eyelets are not smooth. had to replace laces after one month. sand eyelets smooth and bought Ironclad laces and no more issues. worked in -20 temps and with good socks toes did not get cold...
customer_reviews.author: erik lanka

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: Just incredible in all aspects. Order in half number more
customer_reviews.author: Nacho

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely comfortable to wear. The did not feel heavy. It is the best footwear I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: mc in texas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooler wet weather. Too warm for summer hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Stugotz

customer_reviews.title: He required a great boot for stability
customer_reviews.text: My husband hunts. He required a great boot for stability,and warmth in the woods..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, DRY, COLD WEATHER BOOT.
customer_reviews.text: I AM A 91/2 SHOE , BUT LIKE ALITTLE ROOM IN A WINTER BOOT SO I ORDERED A HALF SIZE LARGER. FIT A EXPECTED. KEEPS FEET DRY IN HORRIBLE MICHIGAN SNOW CONDITIONS. ALSO KEEPS FEET QUITE WARM.LIGHT,FLEXIBLE AND COMFORTABLE. GLEAD I FINALLY PURCHASED A REAL PAIR OF WINTER BOOTS.
customer_reviews.author: BELLIS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good boots and good enough to be used all around during 2016 big blizzard!
customer_reviews.author: dw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hope they are warm and snuggley,will be zero here this week.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and comfortable boot. Used daily for walking the dogs, snowshoeing, and flexible enough for winter biking. Good boot to have sinde I live at 11,000 feet in the rockies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pair for my husband and he loves it. Very cushion and warm for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Only drawback is the lacing. Other than that they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kary Gregoire

customer_reviews.title: so good. I've only worn them around the house for ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I've only worn them around the house for a number of hours. They feel roomy with my summer-weight socks, so they'll probably fit just right with thicker winter-weight socks. I didn't notice much in the way of arch support, but I have insanely high arches, so take that as you will. The good news is that there is plenty of space inside for aftermarket insoles (if one so chooses).
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Chiberia Approved
customer_reviews.text: I had been rocking some Asics all winter in Chicago. But, suddenly there was a polar vortex coming. I needed to survive the snow, and ensuing negative 40 degree temps, and these shoes were just the thing. And they stay looking sharp with a simple rag wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Chance

customer_reviews.title: good boots
customer_reviews.text: Good light shoes,my husband loves them. Gave it a 4 since he hasn't quite worn them in bad weather yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Although made in Vietnam, these boots are exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: Although made in Vietnam, these boots are exactly what I expect from Vasque. I think the people complaining about the lacing system need to be smarter than their boots and see if you loosen the laces down to the gusset freely, there's no problem getting in or out. If you have to re-lace anything, you're really doing it wrong... These have ankle support similar to my Summer Vasque's, and the loop to hook the gaiters and the ledge over the heel for snowshoe straps make these boots the most featured and highest quality Winter boots yet....
customer_reviews.author: JudgeGarry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight boot fits great I'm very happy with this boot
customer_reviews.author: melissa hagner

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these boots for my son to take on ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my son to take on a skiing trip. He said they kept his feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Fits good with thick
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my feet warm and dry. Fits good with thick socks
customer_reviews.author: alston

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots were true size, did great in the snow (walking/ hiking), and were easy to fit/ did not hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mirsu-Paun

customer_reviews.title: warm winter boots
customer_reviews.text: Thesea boots were a gift for my husband. He loves the fit and warmth they provide, he said they are very comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.author: sheri deluca

customer_reviews.title: I like them so much this is my second pair in ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a letter carrier in Vermont so I have gone through a lot of boots in the winter.I like them so much this is my second pair in four years. Along with a pair of merino wool socks, from below zero all day to 35 degrees and freezing rain my feet stay warm and dry all through the season. The only problem I've had is that the heel wore down. That's the reason for the second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... small order one size up I did they are awesome 👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: They run small order one size up I did they are awesome 👍🏿
customer_reviews.author: Dave Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Basque review
customer_reviews.text: It's waterproof ,insulated I like it even I just try it on.also it not heavy- nice shaped. Beautiful design ans soft
customer_reviews.author: Intecab Ali

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: vasque is the only brand of shoes i will buy simply because they last are reasonably priced and most importantly they always fit i never get a blister from them and finding shoes that fit is a logistical nightmare . im a 7 1/2 and im 5 ft 10 so getting shoes for my insanely tiny feet is a nightmare if i go into a store
customer_reviews.author: Af17

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was a bit snug, but they are super warm! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: BST

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Warm dry feet. Lacing system not as bad as some reviews say.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, warm and light boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love those boots. They are true size so dont bother pickin one larger than your original shoe size... Very nice boots!
customer_reviews.author: Mathieu Lacombe

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: very light weight and warm a very good winter boot. well worth the price and very east to wear comfortable
customer_reviews.author: dave kitchen

customer_reviews.title: I have used them for a couple of days and they do seem to be more comfortable. They fit OK now
customer_reviews.text: The boots were a bit narrow and also a bit stiff. The reviews did say that there is a brake in period. I have used them for a couple of days and they do seem to be more comfortable. They fit OK now. So far they are waterproof and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Solomons

customer_reviews.title: Your money's worth..
customer_reviews.text: ..that is exactly what you get out of the box with these boot's! Great fit&look for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Faat1

customer_reviews.title: Boot was a good quality boot
customer_reviews.text: Boot was a good quality boot. Had to return it because it was too narrow. Looks like it would offer good support. High quality materials. Wanted to try this boot, because I have read very good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and he loves them. Very warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous person

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot. Appears to be of good quality. Haven't had a chance to test it in the snow yet. This is my second pair of Vasque boots. Very similar fit, which is true to sizing for me. Overall a comfortable winter boot. We'll see how it performs, but I expect good things.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chase

customer_reviews.title: Very good winter hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots have worked very well for me, they are comfortable, have good traction and are very light. I use them primarily with Smart Wool socks and warmth has not been an issue. I have used them while hiking down to around 6 degrees Fahrenheit and my feet were plenty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Vasque Men's Snowburban Ultradry Insulated Snow Boot
product_meta.description: At Vasque, they are committed to making functional, innovative and aesthetic footwear that performs to the highest standards. Their ultimate goal is to make shoes that inspire you to get outdoors and embark on an adventure. Incorporating and developing new and innovative technologies into their boots is what keeps Vasque at the top of their game.
feature_bullets: 100% Waterproof Polyurethane Coated Leather,Waterproof Textile, Fleece Collar
Waterproof snow boot featuring gaiter D-ring and rubber toe cap and heel kick
